title: Why Rito, Why... Its April Fools and No U.R.F ;(

embed.description: From the original clone-tastic One For All to the frenetic manatee magic of Ultra Rapid Fire, featured game modes provide unique spins on the classic League formula. Now, more than two years after the debut of our first game mode, we're announcing a rotating queue that'll bring the alternative action on weekends with a suite of familiar game modes and maybe a fresh face or two.

replies.body: if you read we will get urf twice this year though
Only for 2 days each time so that not worth @URFNEEDSJUSTICE   {{champion:32}}  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Was reading whole thing, I know it's coming twice this year, but still wanted it on April Fools.
Yeah, but only for 2 days each time... Usually we would get a good 2 and a half weeks of urf, now we are only getting 4-6 days of it... Riot thought this was a good idea how?
Its an April fools that it won't be here
